Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

As Red Bolt confronts Dachande, Freewing reaches the shore with the supplies. 
He cuts some wood into planks, and after removing the rope and retieing it 
around the planks and Computer equipment, sets off flying across the water, 
on his long journey to Australia.

--part1_2f.1035b863.27a60295_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<BR>He cuts some wood into planks, and after removing the rope and retieing it
